==== intersectionTypeInference3.ts (6 errors) ====
    // Repro from #19682
    
    type Nominal<Kind extends string, Type> = Type & {
        [Symbol.species]: Kind;
         ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Symbol'.
    };
    
    type A = Nominal<'A', string>;
    
    declare const a: Set<A>;
                     ~~~
!!! error TS2583: Cannot find name 'Set'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to 'es2015' or later.
    declare const b: Set<A>;
                     ~~~
!!! error TS2583: Cannot find name 'Set'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to 'es2015' or later.
    
    const c1 = Array.from(a).concat(Array.from(b));
               ~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Array'.
                                    ~~~~~

    declare function from<T>(): T[];
